title: How do you teach empathy? - Jonathan Juravich

multiple-choice.question: What inspired the speaker's interest in teaching empathy to children?

options.label: A
options.text: Her grandmother's family's experience with her grandmother's blindness and the way it influenced their living space organization

options.label: B
options.text: Watching Disney movies with her grandmother, which helped her understand her grandmother's experiences as a blind person

options.label: C
options.text: Participating in a school-wide curriculum development

options.label: D

options.label: C

options.label: B

multiple-choice.question: What is the primary concern of Quexo, the village shaman, in the year 1400 BCE?

options.label: B

options.label: C
options.text: The upcoming religious festival and trade market are a distraction from Quexo's concern

options.text: The absence of the highland shamans is a minor issue compared to the main concern

options.label: B

options.label: B

options.label: C

options.label: D

options.label: D

options.label: C

options.label: D

options.label: D

options.label: C

title: Why can't dogs eat chocolate?
